name: maze of terror
description:
Hello everyone,  welcome to my new  3D simple game im still working on it,  you can give me any kind of advices that can help me, i made this game and i created everything in the level and the map.

This game is a simple and usual  maze horror where you have to achieve the goal hidden in this map randomly while a monster is chasing you, try to find your goal to win 

click on download then on No thanks, just take me to the downloads if you dont want to pay any price
